title: Are Investors Ready For Legal Cannabis?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Are investors ready for the next leg of cannabis legalization and what it does to cannabis companies? That's a question asked by Mike Regan and Colin Ferrian who run MJResearchCo, which provides rigorous investment analysis of the legal cannabis industry. We also discuss the Trulieve/Harvest deal, various players set on dominating California, and what makes a strong operator. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
